TopicTitle: Framerate Hit with Using EVA Pack?

Articles.Content:
All in all, 1.05 has much smoother performance than 1.04. Except for 1 thing. Every time I fire the EVA jetpack, I get a total screen freeze for about 1/2 a second, then all is back to normal. Except that now I've overshot the hatch I was trying to line up on, so I have to tap the opposite jet, and again because of that resulting overshoot. EVA thus becomes pretty much a slideshow in the last few meters of easing up to a hatch.

Never had this happen in previous versions. Anybody else seeing this?

Nope, not seeing this at all, and if I recall correctly this was caused by an addon.

Also this should be in Support, though I'll assume no addons for now.

Are you seeing anything in your logs when you use the jetpack? What about regular RCS?

Edited November 15, 2015 by sal_vager

Nope, not seeing this at all, and if I recall correctly this was caused by an addon.

Any idea which? I'm using the same ones I had in 1.04 where this issue didn't occur.

Are you seeing anything in your logs when you use the jetpack? What about regular RCS?

Ain't unlocked any RCS yet. Will let you know in a while.
